description:
Shusuke`s review of Hiyoko`s book appears in a magazine. Hiyoko quietly enjoys the article, but Eriko`s harsh criticism brings her down. Shusuke notices a strange relationship between Eriko and Hiyoko.
Hayato and Naru`s search for her bicycle hits a wall. Just as the two are about to give up, they discover a surprising truth.
Source: crunchyroll
